summary: An email from Laura Isabel Woods to an unspecified attorney regarding Jeffrey Epstein, referencing an alias registration in Beaufort, NC, and requesting hotel compensation for an incident at a Marriott property in China. The sender identifies herself as a teacher at Hangzhou International School.

persons.name: Laura Isabel Woods
persons.role: Teacher at Hangzhou International School, email sender
persons.context: Identifies herself as a teacher at Hangzhou International School in China, emails an attorney about Jeffrey Epstein's alias and requests compensation from Marriott for an incident at their property.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referenced as having an alias registered in Beaufort, NC, and is the subject of the email.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein had a registered alias in Beaufort, North Carolina.
Laura Isabel Woods, a teacher at Hangzhou International School, claims an incident occurred at a Marriott property in China.
The email requests Marriott pay for the sender's hotel stay and re-housing due to the incident.
The correspondence is dated September 12, 2019, after Epstein's death in August 2019.
